subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Jon Niese pitched seven strong innings for the Mets, but their bullpen faltered again as Buster Posey broke an eighth-inning tie and lifted San Francisco to its major-league-leading 40th victory.
snippet: Jon Niese pitched seven strong innings for the Mets, but their bullpen faltered again as Buster Posey broke an eighth-inning tie and lifted San Francisco to its major-league-leading 40th victory.
